The Impact
Your
support of this campaign is essential to the well being and fair treatment of
Pussy Riot and to all those around the world facing similar government
injustices.
Whatever
the crowdfunding campaign you should do your due diligence on the validity of
the campaign, offerings and people involved.
<h2>Other Ways
You Can Help
<ol>
<li>
<span style=""font-size: 15px; line-height: 1.45em;"">Anonymously
donate an amount
<li>
<span style=""font-size: 15px; line-height: 1.45em;"">Visit
Change.org and sign the petition
<li><span style=""font-size: 15px; line-height: 1.45em;"">Share this
Indiegogo campaign with others
Celebrity Call 2 Action

Some celebrities use crowdfunding to fund their pet projects. However, Clooney-esq celebrities use crowdfunding to raise awareness and funds for worthwhile causes. If you’re a celebrity, please help out. Contact me to donate rewards to this campaign and/or donate.
Q&A
Why are you
doing this?
After watching the 60 Minutes segment on Pussy Riot, I
thought it would be great to donate my time and effort to a worthy cause. I
HATE oppressive governments and believe people should be able to express
themselves as long as it is in the confines of the law. Pussy Riot isn't just
standing up for Russians; their message is important the world over for
example in places like China, Quebec, Canada and others.
Is this a
politically motivated campaign?
Somewhat, but not really. I’m sure you have beliefs and hopefully you are allowed to express them freely so why shouldn't others? That’s all this
campaign is about. This campaign is not about Putin or other dictators; it’s
about a band of ladies who want their country to experience many of the same
benefits as other free and democratic countries. I don’t see anything wrong
with that, do you?
Why are you
only raising $10,000?
What? That must be a typo! My (our) goal is to set a new
crowdfunding record and show people that Pebble’s record of $10.2M can be
beaten by a worthy cause. Let’s raise the roof on crowdfunding and shoot for
the moon (or at least $50,000).
FYI - we definitely MUST exceed $10,000 so that we don't get
charged 9% in fees and so that more money can go to Masha and Nadia.
Listen to
the Pussy Riot single
Images credits: 60 Minutes, ABC News, Let's Start a Pussy Riot (Jade French, Emily Neu), Pussy Riot, GQ and The Guardian

Celebrity Call 2 Action

Some celebrities use crowdfunding to fund their pet projects. However, Clooney-esq celebrities use crowdfunding to raise awareness and funds for worthwhile causes. If you’re a celebrity, please help out. Contact me to donate rewards to this campaign and/or donate.
Q&A
Why are you
doing this?
After watching the 60 Minutes segment on Pussy Riot, I
thought it would be great to donate my time and effort to a worthy cause. I
HATE oppressive governments and believe people should be able to express
themselves as long as it is in the confines of the law. Pussy Riot isn't just
standing up for Russians; their message is important the world over for
example in places like China, Quebec, Canada and others.
Is this a
politically motivated campaign?
Somewhat, but not really. I’m sure you have beliefs and hopefully you are allowed to express them freely so why shouldn't others? That’s all this
campaign is about. This campaign is not about Putin or other dictators; it’s
about a band of ladies who want their country to experience many of the same
benefits as other free and democratic countries. I don’t see anything wrong
with that, do you?
Why are you
only raising $10,000?
What? That must be a typo! My (our) goal is to set a new
crowdfunding record and show people that Pebble’s record of $10.2M can be
beaten by a worthy cause. Let’s raise the roof on crowdfunding and shoot for
the moon (or at least $50,000).
FYI - we definitely MUST exceed $10,000 so that we don't get
charged 9% in fees and so that more money can go to Masha and Nadia.

the Pussy Riot single

Update:  I've put the most obvious question first.

The menu at b.o.s. is not Urasawa-expensive.  Why is my goal so high?
Indiegogo's minimum funding is $500.  I would have loved to set it as
low as $100 to help it get fully funded.  That said, I have set this
campaign up for flexible funding, so even if I don't reach the campaign
goal of $500, I can put what I receive, minus the 9% Indiegogo fee and
3-5% payment processing fees, toward a dinner at b.o.s.

Who am I?

I am apparently someone who asks and answers my own questions.  I go by The Offalo online.  I regularly post my meals to my Instagram feed.  I'm also a daily participant on Chowhound.  I love all things offal, but I also love sushi, ramen, dim sum, tacos, etc.  Really, if the food is good, I will eat it!

Why did I create this campaign?

I've been thinking about ways to fund my blog.  I'm not at a level to really monetize it, but I thought at the micro level, perhaps I could get individuals to fund me on a case by case basis.  So this is an experiment to see if I could be successful at crowdfunding a single review.

Why should strangers fund my dining out?

I am hoping that those who find my blog informative or entertaining will attach some value to it and want to help support my ability to try new restaurants and report back on them.

Why did I choose b.o.s. for this campaign?

My blog, while not offal-exclusive, is offal-focused when it can be.  b.o.s. is one of the only, if not the only, offal-centric restaurants in L.A.  I thought it was a good fit for my inaugural campaign. 

Note:  The ""b.o.s."" photo used in this campaign is from b.o.s.'s Instagram account, used with permission.  b.o.s. does not officially endorse or support this campaign, though I'm sure they would like it to succeed since it'd bring them a customer.

The menu at b.o.s. is not Urasawa-expensive.  Why is my goal so high?
Answered above.
What is my ""internal"" funding goal?

My personal funding goal is $150.  b.o.s. used to have a $85 or $95 ""omakase"" (chef's choice), but it is no longer offered on the regular menu.  However, I've heard that a tasting menu in the same price range can still be prearranged, so $150 should cover that cost, plus tax and tip, after all the fees have been assessed on the fund.
What if the campaign doesn't reach that goal?

Whatever amount I get, I will use it toward a meal and write something about my meal.  Even if I only get $5, I will find a tacqueria and buy a lengua (beef tongue) taco or two and review the heck out of it!
What if the campaign exceeds my goal?

I don't realistically expect that to happen.  If I exceeds my personal goal by a modest amount, after eating at and reviewing b.o.s., I may put any extra money toward my webhosting costs and fulfilling any perks earned by my contributors.

If I still have funds to spend, then I may decide to dine at and review additional restaurants, or I may have my wife or a blogger friend to dine with me at b.o.s.  I'll cross that bridge if I come to it, and I will definitely ask my contributors to help me decide.

El cuaderno
del corrector nos sumerge
en un país, Turquía, en una región, Kurdistán, en lo que será el imponente
escenario donde plantear las disyuntivas vitales del protagonista; en una mano,
la cuna de una civilización antigua (Mesopotamia) y
en la otra, el conflicto kurdo, la guerra civil siria, la reciente guerra del
golfo y la inestable democracia turca.
Héctor es
corrector de estilo en una editorial de segunda y se enfrenta, en mitad de un
viaje, a una doble crisis personal apoyándose en su cuaderno. A él confía sus
sueños frustrados, sus anhelos y las vivencias de
una travesía entre dos mundos. Héctor busca la solución a sus preguntas y no
duda en aprovechar las experiencias que se le presentan aunque sean contrarias
a sus principios.El
cuaderno, un personaje más de la novela, acaba en otras manos gracias a Kasim,
un activista kurdo y alma máter de Héctor. De la exhaustiva investigación
realizada sobre el cuaderno conocemos unos personajes que dibujan una
instantánea de la realidad actual de Oriente Medio.
En El
cuaderno del corrector, el autor nos transporta hacia una
brumosa frontera entre lo vivido y lo imaginado como fórmula idónea para crear
un texto que trasciende la crónica de los hechos: la búsqueda de experiencias
podría ser más útil que sus consecuencias. Una reflexión sobre el arte de
contar, un gran viaje iniciático, una increíble aventura. Todo aderezado con
pinceladas históricas que apuntalan la narración y mantienen vivo el interés
del lector conduciéndolo con habilidad de la mano hasta su sorprendente
desenlace.
Mucho más que una novela de
viajes…
¿Quiénes?
Tandaia es una joven editorial con voluntad de cambio, de dar
la alternativa a autores que no la encuentran en otro lugar, con nuevas y
refrescantes ideas como es el crowdfunding.
De este modo eres tú, ahora que te estás planteando
cómo colaborar, el que decide si la obra que te presentamos verá la luz pasando
a formar parte de nuestro catálogo... porque consideramos al lector parte
fundamental del proceso.
Hoy te presentamos a Ángel Inoriza.
Doctor en Medicina, ha vivido en Vitoria, Istanbul, Gran Canaria,
London, Badajoz o New York, aunque afincado ahora entre Sevilla y Huelva
mientras ejerce, en el muy literario Hospital Juan Ramón Jiménez, como oncólogo.
Ángel
Inoriza
ha publicado biografía, Patobiografía de Paul Newman (You&Us, 2012); ensayo literario Sándor
Márai y la víscera del alma (You&Us,
2010). Coautor de varios relatos en el libro Cuentos de Médicos (Ergon,
2005 y 2009) y en Palabras como bálsamo (Ses,
2006). Primer premio del IV Certamen de narraciones cortas del Ses
por Quitapellejos (2006); finalista en el III Concurso de relatos breves semergen (2005) por La
última hora. Colaborador en la revista literaria Odradek así como en el blog Factoría
Odradek con numerosas entradas. Ha sido también Director y guionista del
documental ""La cara humana del cáncer"" con mención especial
del jurado en el XVI Festival Videomed 2008.
Ángel Inoriza irrumpe ahora con fuerza en
la narrativa de ficción con esta, su primera novela.
Para arrancar el proyecto nos hemos fijado como
objetivo 850€; esta es la cantidad que recaudaríamos si alrededor de cuarenta
mecenas se hiciesen, cada cual, con un ejemplar de esta primera edición.
<ul>
<li>Teniendo
acceso a las galeradas de edición.
<li>Recibiendo
un ejemplar semanas antes de la salida al mercado de la obra.
<li>Si
bien, también podrías ver tu nombre en los agradecimientos aportando un
poco más.
Los fondos recaudados, se utilizarán para sacar
adelante esta primera edición de El cuaderno del corrector que saldría
pocas semanas después a la venta.
Además...
Sabemos que son tiempos difíciles, también nosotros
los sufrimos, y es posible que no te encuentres en disposición de apoyarnos con
tu mecenazgo en estos momentos... pero esperamos que si esto te ha llegado al
alma, incluso si tal vez conoces en persona al autor, trates de difundir esta
campaña (facebook, twitter, blogs, boca-oreja... ) para que alcancemos
nuestra meta y Ángel Inoriza vea publicada su obra.
Gracias por vuestro tiempo.

Why this Book?

Hi, I’m Karen Brody, I help men who want a deep and satisfying connection with a woman, master how to turn up a woman’s desire, by leading him through steps and practices that result in a deeply satisfying, passionate relationship.

Having coached thousands of men, I know that men, and the women who love them, physically ache for the information I share --for simple, and yet, profound keys to open the doors to greater passion and love.

The Issue:

Men struggle with what women want romantically and sexually! Most men have a perfunctory understanding. They know that a woman likes tenderness, flowers, or to be lovingly touched, but few know the depth and complexity of a feminine heart – and how to feed a woman in a way that blooms her into her most radiant and joyous self.

Open Her: 7 Masculine Ways to Arouse Your Woman’s Love & Desire is based on 7 masculine archetypes a man can embody to engage his woman in a deeper dance of pleasure and love. A man is inspired to turn up his masculinity and to love being masculine, and to engage his woman in ways that get immediate and satisfying results.

A man is inspired to celebrate his masculine gifts and share them with his woman in new, sexy ways, in Open Her, and is also inspired to be more of the man he wants to be. A man might see himself in ""The Artist"" type, but feel challenged by the bold resolve of The Warrior and choose to take on that aspect of masculinity for his own growth.

I know how powerful Open Her is when the information gets into the hands of the man (or woman) who is ready for it.  I’ve seen the information transform my clients from frustrated and confused, to boldly passionate and loving.

Finally a man understands that the way into a woman’s heart is not a trick or a compromise, it’s about engaging what is already inside of him-- his masculine key – made to unlock what is inside of his woman.
Who Wants/Craves this Book?

What man doesn’t want the keys and secret codes to masterfully unlock his woman’s desire for him? And what woman doesn’t want to be blown open, on all levels of her being, by a man who is masterful at love?

I wrote this book for a specific demographic of smart, evolved men who cherish women and want extraordinary relationships. These men feel excited and empowered by the information, and finally experience the ease and success they've always wanted in love with a woman. 

I have the utmost confidence in the insights, practices and wisdom of Open Her because it’s been tested over 11 years in my practice with men. In order for men to succeed at inspiring the desire and love they most want from a woman, Open Her needs to be on the breakfast table with the granola and the Peet’s Coffee!

It’s practically impossible for men to find this kind of information. What’s on the market is either heavily about sex, or too relationship focused to hold the attention of men. The reason this book works and that men eat it up, is that it celebrates masculinity! Instead of asking a man to jump through hoops for love, it inspires a man to leverage his masculine gifts, and who he already is, in a positive and empowering way.

A strong secondary audience for Open Her is women in relationships or relationship “recovery” looking for the answers to, “Why didn’t it work?” Or why am I feeling so unhappy and unfulfilled in love? How can I get my man to love me in the way I most crave and need?

Open Her illuminates and gives shape to a woman’s deepest (sometimes unconscious) yearnings. It’s like a mouthwatering menu of everything a woman has ever hoped a man would express to her in love – spelled out in 7 enticing masculine archetypes.
Why Me as the Author?

Confession: I didn’t always love men! I was deeply hurt by a man at a very young age. I’ve walked through every dark corridor you can imagine to find the light, and have (through will and faith), and come out the other side to love and embrace men as few women can.
I’ve given heart and soul in my work to understanding what men most need to succeed at love and to be sexually whole, and I know I’m here on earth to give that gift in any way I can.
I am also former journalist (it was a first career) with eight years of writing experience for newspapers and magazines, and I hold an MA in Counseling Psychology.
You can learn more about my coaching services on my website: http://www.loveandintimacycoach.com
What will you get in funding this project?

I’ve poured my heart and soul into my perks, as I really wanted to give you something intimate and meaningful. I want you to know the power of a passionate, fulfilling relationship and have devised many ways for you to receive that. Here are the exciting perks you can choose to bring into your life to access my wisdom and support:
* A shout out of deep gratitude on my Facebook page
* A digital copy of Open Her
*Me on video teaching you how to create a deep, sexy, lasting connection with your partner
*A special digital audio, featuring me reading Chapter One to you with never before heard content.
* 30-minutes to talk with me by phone or Skype about how to turn up the fire of attraction and connection in your current, or upcoming relationship.
*A seat in my exclusive Tele-course June 10 &17. Dive into the teachings in Open Her, and ask me questions, directly.
*Sixty minutes to talk with me me about how to heat up attraction or overcome blocks in your love life.
*I answer six of your burning relationship or sex questions by email.
*A copy of my new e-book, “Why She Stopped Desiring You, 3 Things Every Man Should Know.”
* A Private one-to-one session with my dear friend, the “Soul Guide,” Nancy Boyd.
*A personal acknowledgement in my book along with my best friend, my editors, and my lovers.
* An exclusive 5-day retreat with me in San Miguel de Allende, for 10 lucky men and women.
*I will fly to your city in the US, Mexico or Canada to offer an Exclusive Day long workshop on the principle teachings of Open Her.
What Does Your Donation Go Specifically?
What I need to publish my book is:
*$4900 for publishing services with Love Your Life Publishing that include:
Editing and Proofing
Final Cover Design
Interior Design
Upload to Create Space and wholesale booksellers
Formatting for Kindle, IPad and Nook
Social Media Promotion
Printing promotional copies of book
Professional Media Kit/Press Releases
***$1,500 for a New Computer

My 7-year old, Ibook G4, is a real dinosaur and makes it painful and incredibly slow to get anything done. To be on top of my publishing game, and my marketing, I need a fast, up to date computer that doesn’t stall every time it sees a video!
Cost of my perks and to cover Indiegogo fees: $700
$7,200 is my total fundraising goal.
What if you don’t meet your goal?

I am choosing to know that I will make, and even likely exceed my goal, because this book is so direly needed in the world! And I also have tremendous faith in all of you who will feel the powerful possibility of this information for yourselves and your love lives, and will eagerly want to support the book’s release and success.

For those of you who want to know that I have a Plan B, I will forego the new Mac, and put all of the money into editing, design and publishing. I will follow through on delivering all of my perks by the dates given. You absolutely have my word.
The Impact

My mission is to inspire men to be truly powerful and to love women deeply and authentically. I empower men to succeed with women and to love being men. This is direly needed in the world. Just look at the divorce rates.

Your funds will help make it possible for men who read my book to recover their sense of masculine joy and pride, and to create truly satisfying relationships with women. Your funding will also help women get the love they dearly want and crave.

I believe that OPEN HER: 7 Masculine Ways to Arouse Your Woman’s Love & Desire will do for men and masculinity what John Gray’s “Men are Mars, Women are From Venus” did for communication between men and women, and what “The Five Love Languages,” by Gary Chapman, did for expressing what we each need to feel loved.
Other Ways You Can Help

Some people just can’t contribute, financially, but that doesn’t mean you can’t help! If you’d pass this campaign onto your friends on Facebook, Twitter and Linked In, and ask them to support the book, I’d be eternally grateful! You never know who you might help by way of a simple “share.”
Why this book will succeed!

1. First, the book is done! It’s not a dream. And, based on early reads by three great editors and many clients and friends, it’s hitting all the right buttons and I’m being urged to get it into the world.
Here is one endorsement from a New York Times best-selling author:

""Open Her is a soulful book that teaches men what women really want romantically and sexually. This is an insightful read for any man who wants to truly understand women, and create a deep, passionate, loving relationship."" ~ Marci Shimoff, #1 NY Times bestselling author of Love for No Reason and Happy for No Reason
And another from Raphael Cushnir, a regular contributor to ""O Magazine:""

""All big-hearted men, pay attention! This is a truly remarkable book. Karen Brody has managed to create a landmark guide to loving a woman that also functions as a path to self-realization. After encountering so many great stories, and bracing insights, I can't wait for my second read.""

Raphael Cushnir, author of The One Thing Holding You Back and Surfing Your Inner Sea

2. I believe that you will feel the potential for Open Her in the world and in your love life, and help me make it fly!

 I truly look forward to contributing something meaningful and transformative to your love life!
Thank you with all my heart.
Karen Brody

Finally a man understands that the way into a woman’s heart is not a trick or a compromise, it’s about engaging what is already inside of him-- his masculine key – made to unlock what is inside of his woman.
Who Wants/Craves this Book?

What man doesn’t want the keys and secret codes to masterfully unlock his woman’s desire for him? And what woman doesn’t want to be blown open, on all levels of her being, by a man who is masterful at love?

I wrote this book for a specific demographic of smart, evolved men who cherish women and want extraordinary relationships. These men feel excited and empowered by the information, and finally experience the ease and success they've always wanted in love with a woman.  I have the utmost confidence in the insights, practices and wisdom of Open Her because it’s been tested over 11 years in my practice with men. In order for men to succeed at inspiring the desire and love they most want from a woman, Open Her needs to be on the breakfast table with the granola and the Peet’s Coffee!

It’s practically impossible for men to find this kind of information. What’s on the market is either heavily about sex, or too relationship focused to hold the attention of men. The reason this book works and that men eat it up, is that it celebrates masculinity! Instead of asking a man to jump through hoops for love, it inspires a man to leverage his masculine gifts, and who he already is, in a positive and empowering way.

A strong secondary audience for Open Her is women in relationships or relationship “recovery” looking for the answers to, “Why didn’t it work?” Or why am I feeling so unhappy and unfulfilled in love? How can I get my man to love me in the way I most crave and need?

Open Her illuminates and gives shape to a woman’s deepest (sometimes unconscious) yearnings. It’s like a mouthwatering menu of everything a woman has ever hoped a man would express to her in love – spelled out in 7 enticing masculine archetypes.
Why Me as the Author?

Confession: I didn’t always love men! I was deeply hurt by a man at a very young age. I’ve walked through every dark corridor you can imagine to find the light, and have (through will and faith), and come out the other side to love and embrace men as few women can.
I’ve given heart and soul in my work to understanding what men most need to succeed at love and to be sexually whole, and I know I’m here on earth to give that gift in any way I can.
I am also former journalist (it was a first career) with eight years of writing experience for newspapers and magazines, and I hold an MA in Counseling Psychology.
You can learn more about my coaching services on my website: http://www.loveandintimacycoach.com
What will you get in funding this project?

I’ve poured my heart and soul into my perks, as I really wanted to give you something intimate and meaningful. I want you to know the power of a passionate, fulfilling relationship and have devised many ways for you to receive that. Here are the exciting perks you can choose to bring into your life to access my wisdom and support:
* A shout out of deep gratitude on my Facebook page
* A digital copy of Open Her
*Me on video teaching you how to create a deep, sexy, lasting connection with your partner
*A special digital audio, featuring me reading Chapter One to you with never before heard content.
* 30-minutes to talk with me by phone or Skype about how to turn up the fire of attraction and connection in your current, or upcoming relationship.
*A seat in my exclusive Tele-course June 10 &17. Dive into the teachings in Open Her, and ask me questions, directly.
*Sixty minutes to talk with me me about how to heat up attraction or overcome blocks in your love life.
*I answer six of your burning relationship or sex questions by email.
*A copy of my new e-book, “Why She Stopped Desiring You, 3 Things Every Man Should Know.”
* A Private one-to-one session with my dear friend, the “Soul Guide,” Nancy Boyd.
*A personal acknowledgement in my book along with my best friend, my editors, and my lovers.
* An exclusive 5-day retreat with me in San Miguel de Allende, for 10 lucky men and women.
*I will fly to your city in the US, Mexico or Canada to offer an Exclusive Day long workshop on the principle teachings of Open Her.
What Does Your Donation Go Specifically?
What I need to publish my book is:
*$4900 for publishing services with Love Your Life Publishing that include:
Editing and Proofing
Final Cover Design
Interior Design
Upload to Create Space and wholesale booksellers
Formatting for Kindle, IPad and Nook
Social Media Promotion
Printing promotional copies of book
Professional Media Kit/Press Releases
***$1,500 for a New Computer

My 7-year old, Ibook G4, is a real dinosaur and makes it painful and incredibly slow to get anything done. To be on top of my publishing game, and my marketing, I need a fast, up to date computer that doesn’t stall every time it sees a video!
Cost of my perks and to cover Indiegogo fees: $700
$7,200 is my total fundraising goal.
What if you don’t meet your goal?

I am choosing to know that I will make, and even likely exceed my goal, because this book is so direly needed in the world! And I also have tremendous faith in all of you who will feel the powerful possibility of this information for yourselves and your love lives, and will eagerly want to support the book’s release and success.

For those of you who want to know that I have a Plan B, I will forego the new Mac, and put all of the money into editing, design and publishing. I will follow through on delivering all of my perks by the dates given. You absolutely have my word.
The Impact

My mission is to inspire men to be truly powerful and to love women deeply and authentically. I empower men to succeed with women and to love being men. This is direly needed in the world. Just look at the divorce rates.

Your funds will help make it possible for men who read my book to recover their sense of masculine joy and pride, and to create truly satisfying relationships with women. Your funding will also help women get the love they dearly want and crave.

I believe that OPEN HER: 7 Masculine Ways to Arouse Your Woman’s Love & Desire will do for men and masculinity what John Gray’s “Men are Mars, Women are From Venus” did for communication between men and women, and what “The Five Love Languages,” by Gary Chapman, did for expressing what we each need to feel loved.
Other Ways You Can Help

Some people just can’t contribute, financially, but that doesn’t mean you can’t help! If you’d pass this campaign onto your friends on Facebook, Twitter and Linked In, and ask them to support the book, I’d be eternally grateful! You never know who you might help by way of a simple “share.”
Why this book will succeed!

1. First, the book is done! It’s not a dream. And, based on early reads by three great editors and many clients and friends, it’s hitting all the right buttons and I’m being urged to get it into the world.
Here is one endorsement from a New York Times best-selling author:

Open Her is a soulful book that teaches men what women really want romantically and sexually. This is an insightful read for any man who wants to truly understand women, and create a deep, passionate, loving relationship."" ~ Marci Shimoff, #1 NY Times bestselling author of Love for No Reason and Happy for No Reason
And another from Raphael Cushnir, a regular contributor to ""O Magazine:""

All big-hearted men, pay attention! This is a truly remarkable book. Karen Brody has managed to create a landmark guide to loving a woman that also functions as a path to self-realization. After encountering so many great stories, and bracing insights, I can't wait for my second read.""Raphael Cushnir, author of The One Thing Holding You Back and Surfing Your Inner Sea

2. I believe that you will feel the potential for Open Her in the world and in your love life, and help me make it fly!  I truly look forward to contributing something meaningful and transformative to your love life!
Thank you with all my heart.

Short Summary
Hello!

I would like to thank you for helping me reach my goal of completing my very first book project, my ""Conversations With Shark Tank Winners! How The Shark Tank Effect Dramatically Increased Sales, Exposure And More For These Successful Entrepreneurs"" multimedia book project featuring the entrepreneurs from the hit reality TV show Shark Tank!

Featuring interviews with the entrepreneurs from the hit ABC TV show Shark Tank, readers will benefit from the experiences these innovators share as they reveal in depth how they developed their ideas/products, the Shark Tank audition process, their deals with the Sharks, the Shark Tank Effect, how their businesses are doing post Shark Tank and more!

The multimedia book will feature audio interviews, digital photos, bonus video Q&A sessions with selected entrepreneurs and tips from the business owners on how to be a successful entrepreneur, your best chances for getting on Shark Tank plus they share their best experiences on the show.
The Multimedia Book

The funding I will be receiving will help me complete my book project!  I am in need of an editor/graphics specialist, a digital book format specialist, a webmaster to help tighten up my website plus I need to hire a programmer to convert my book into the various digital book formats for smart phones and tablets.
In addition, I plan on producing various book events and go on a book media tour here in Southern California along with leveraging social media/new media to promote my book.
Bio

For the past 16 plus years, I have produced over 5000 plus interviews in a variety of genres including broadcast radio, Internet Radio, local Television, on demand video segments, podcasts and live Internet Television.

My gift is producing motivating, informative and inspiring interviews featuring a wide array of topics from social media to entrepreneurs for your enjoyment and to help you while on your journey toward greatness!

I love interviewing interesting people, it is what drives me!  People who have a great story to share while contributing toward making society a better place to live in along with helping others to be better through the sharing of ideas, knowledge and experience in one's chosen field.

I believe this campaign of raising the neccessary funds to complete my book will greatly help those who are looking to achieve more in their lives, both personally and professionaly.  These incredible interviews with each of the entrepreneurs can be life changing for someone who hears or watches them.

For myself , the completion and success of this project will help with my own personal hardships and disability that I have dealt with.  I was diagonosed with Rhuemetiod Arthritis over 8 years ago and life has been both painful and very difficult financially.

None the less, I have continued on this journey no matter what to bring you this offering that I have put so much of my life into to help you achieve your dreams!  I ask your help to achieve my dream too!

Your support will mean more to me than words can say.  I truly mean that!  It will help me to finish what I was meant to do, serve you with my gift of producing great interviews plus publish my first multimedia book!
I understand if you cannot help financially at this time. There are other ways of contributing by sharing my story with your friends through social media provided by Indie GoGo!
I wish you every success and happiness while on your journey toward greatness!  And thank you for your help.
With much grattitude and thanks!

Rey Ybarra

Conócenos

Una editorial independiente y un emprendimiento en gestión cultural nos unimos para lograr un objetivo: iniciar un viaje. Les contamos un poco sobre nosotros para que nos conozcan y se animen a apoyar y difundir nuestro trabajo.

Autores Venezolanos nace en el 2012 como una iniciativa personal, motivada por el amor a la lectura y por el palpable vacío que existía en la difusión del talento venezolano. Desde entonces hemos promovido la labor de escritores, músicos y artistas visuales, a través de la difusión de fragmentos de sus obras en prendas de vestir y accesorios seleccionados, tazas, pulseras y bolsos, así como también creando proyectos y organizando eventos literarios para todo público. Nuestro equipo está conformado por Tibisay Guerra (directora), Miguel Díaz (diseño y logística), y Mirna Freitez, (sitio web).

Ideamos eventos y actividades como el Concurso Nacional de Poesía Joven Rafael Cadenas, el cual organizamos junto a Team Poetero, y ya cuenta con su tercera edición, Yoga y Poesía, el Retablillo de Navidad, de Aquiles Nazoa, que se realiza desde el 2012. Junto a Loreal Venezuela y la marca Kérastase realizamos la iniciativa “Sé tú el poema”, la cual lleva poesía venezolana a 58 salones de belleza de todo el país y estuvimos presentes en la Exposición Sentir Venezuela, en la Ciudad de Miami, USA.

Durante este año se ha formado una alianza con la iniciativa Qué Leer para realizar la Silent Reading Party, que ya cuenta con 7 ediciones; organizamos también, junto a la embajada de España y Cultura Chacao, un homenaje al maestro Rafael Cadenas, para celebrar el Premio Reina Sofía de Poesía Iberoamericana. Por últimos, estamos trabajando en nuevo proyecto musical-visual llamado Sonorámica, junto al artista visual Starsky Brines y la editorial Libros del Fuego.

Libros del Fuego es una editorial formada en 2013 por Juan Mercerón, Rodnei Casares y Alberto Sáez, que surge de la inquietud de encontrar en el mercado esos libros que sus fundadores querían leer. En estos 5 años de trabajo, hemos publicado 20 títulos, los cuales han obtenido un reconocimiento dentro y fuera de nuestras fronteras, siendo los más destacados el Premio Latinoamericano de Diseño Editorial, en Argentina, los Libros Más Bellos del Mundo, en Alemania, el Applied Arts Awards Desing, en Canadá y la selección en el Hotlist 2017 y 2018 de la Feria del Libro de Frankfurt, entre otros.

También, mantenemos un constante esfuerzo por participar en las ferias más importantes de Latinoamérica, teniendo una gran receptividad en la Feria del Libro de Bogotá, la Fiesta del Libro y la Cultura en Medellín, la Feria de Editores en Buenos Aires, la Furia del Libro en Santiago de Chile.
En nuestro catálogo hemos tenido la fortuna de contar con autores de amplio reconocimiento como Andrés Neuman, Alberto Salcedo Ramos, Federico García Lorca y Juan Villoro.

Para Libros del Fuego este viaje también significa mostrar los libros que hacemos y el valor que ellos tienen para nosotros, ya que en el 2017 el Ministerio de Cultura de Portugal nos escribió para notificarnos que sería el país homenajeado en la Feria del Libro de Guadalajara, en 2018, razón por la que nos invitaba a ser una de las 30 editoriales que los representara publicando autores de lengua portuguesa, en español, para ser expuestos en su stand durante la feria. Para honrar dicha invitación, decidimos participar publicando dos libros del escritor Mario de Sá Carneiro: La confesión de Lucio e Indicios de oro.
Trabajando juntos

Esta alianza comienza hace 2 años, cuando editamos el primer libro del Concurso de Poesía Joven Rafael Cadenas y desde entonces hemos estado trabajando y apoyándonos en distintos proyectos, lo que nos trae a este momento.

Conversando sobre los objetivos que cada uno se planteaba para este año y conociendo los retos que implica trabajar por la cultura en nuestro país, nos propusimos una meta  con la que, sin saberlo, ambas iniciativas soñábamos desde hace mucho. ¡Formar parte de la Feria del Libro de Guadalajara!, la feria más importante de libros en Latinoamérica. Armándonos de valor y sin saber qué podría pasar decidimos crear una propuesta para participar en este evento.
Nos llenó de mucha alegría saber que nos invitaban a conversar en una mesa llamada Estamos aquí para decir Venezuela: literatura, edición y gestión cultural.

No es ningún secreto lo complejo que se ha vuelto trabajar para la cultura y por eso queremos mostrar cómo seguimos intentándolo y cómo se pueden crear nuevas opciones y estrategias que se adapten a un mercado bastante complejo de desarrollar en este momento.

Sin embargo, no contamos con los recursos necesarios para llegar hasta México y aunque contamos con la colaboración de la feria en algunas áreas, no es suficiente para poder lograr este objetivo. Es por esto que decidimos crear esta campaña y pedirles su apoyo.
Lo que necesitamos
Para poder realizar este viaje de 12 días, nuestro objetivo es que nos ayuden a conseguir 6.500$ que se distribuirán en:
- Comidas.
- Pasajes.
- Traslados internos.
- Alojamiento.
- Costo de envío de recompensas para los contribuyentes.
- Indiegogo.
Lo que obtienes
10$ 1 Libro colección escolar.
15$ 1 Libro sorpresa de la colección LDF.
20$ 1 Libro de “El fin de la lectura”, de Andrés Neuman, que incluye un decálogo del escritor, especial de esta edición.
30$ 1 Libro de “La casa de Bernarda Alba”, ganador del premio Applied Arts Awards Desing (Canadá).
60$ 1 Libro del Premio Poesía Joven Rafael Cadenas, ganador Diploma de Honor en los Libros más bellos del mundo y firmado por el escritor Rafael Cadenas.
80$ 1 Novedad del catálogo de Libros del Fuego + 1 libro de la Casa de Bernarda Alba o 1 libro de El fin de la lectura de Andrés Neuman + 1 bolso de Autores Venezolanos.

100$ 2 Novedad del catálogo de Libros del Fuego + 1 Libro del Premio de Poesía Joven Rafael Cadenas, ganador Diploma de Honor en los Libros más bellos del mundo y firmado por el escritor Rafael Cadenas.
200$ 4 Novedad del catálogo de Libros del Fuego.
350$ Taller de edición (4 clases) +1 franela de Autores Venezolanos.
400$ Coaching editorial (4 sesiones) Presencial o skype.
500$ Taller de edición + cena literaria + 1 aumaco de Autores Venezolanos.
Otras maneras de ayudar
Si no está en tus posibilidades dar un aporte monetario, también puedes ayudarnos de las siguientes formas.
-Comparte nuestro video en tus redes y con tus amigos.
-Visita Indiegogo y comparte nuestra campaña.
-Ayúdanos a difundir nuestro objetivo usando la etiqueta #DecirVenezuela
Si hacemos viral esta campaña más cerca estaremos de legar a la Feria del Libro de Guadalajara 2018.
¡Gracias!
An independent editorial and a cultural management project unite to achieve one goal:  a journey. Let us tell you a little bit about ourselves so you can know more about what we do.

Autores Venezolanos was born in 2012 as a personal initiative, motivated by the love of reading and the palpable emptiness that existed in the diffusion of Venezuelan talent. Since then we have promoted the work of writers, musicians and visual artists, through the spreading of pieces of their works in selected clothes and accessories, cups, bracelets and handbags, as well as creating projects and organizing literary events for all audiences. Our team is formed by Tibisay Guerra (director), Miguel Díaz (design and logistics), and Mirna Freitez, (website).

We develop events as the Concurso Nacional de Poesía Joven Rafael Cadenas, which we organize together with Team Poetero and is already at its third edition. Yoga and poetry, the Christmas Retablillo of Aquiles Nazoa, which takes place since 2012. With Loreal Venezuela and the Kérastase brand  we made the ""Sé tú el poema""(Be the poem) initiative, which brings Venezuelan poetry to 58 beauty salons across the country and we were present at the exhibition Sentir Venezuela(Feel Venezuela) in the city of Miami, USA.

During this year has formed an alliance with the initiative “Qué leer”(What to read) to carry out the Silent Reading Party, which already has 7 editions. It was organized, together with the Embassy of Spain and Culture Chacao, a tribute to the poet Rafael Cadenas, to celebrate the his prize Reina Sofía of Latin American Poetry. We are also working on a new sound project called Sonorámica, along with Visual artist Starsky Brines and editorial Libros del Fuego.

Libros del Fuego is a publishing house formed in 2013 by Juan Merceron, Rodnei Casares and Alberto Sáez, which emerges from the concern to find in the market those books that its founders wanted to read. In  5 years of work, we have published 20 titles which have gained a acknowledgment within and outside our borders. Some of the most important are:  the Latin American Editorial Design Prize in Argentina; The most beautiful books in the world, in Germany; The Applied Arts Awards desing, in Canada and the selection in the Hotlist 2017, and 2018 of the Frankfurt Book Fair, among others.

Also, we maintain a constant effort to participate in the most important fairs of Latin America, having a great receptivity in those in which we participate. Some of them have been: La Feria del libro de Bogota, La Fiesta del Libro y de la Cultura, La Feria de Editores in Buenos Aires, La Furia del Libro in Santiago.
In our catalogue we have the fortune to have widely recognized authors such as Andrés Neuman, Alberto Salcedo Ramos, Federico García Lorca and Juan Villoro.

For Libros del Fuego this trip also means to show the books we make as well as the value they have for us since 2017 the Ministry of Culture of Portugal contacted us to notify that Portugal would be the country honored at the Guadalajara Book Fair  in 2018. For this reason, they invited us to be one of the 30 publishers to represent them by publishing authors of Portuguese language in Spanish to be exhibited at their stand during the fair. To honor this invitation, we decided to participate by publishing two books by the writer Mario de Sá Carneiro: La consefesión de Lucio and  Inicios de oro.
Working together

This alliance began 2 years ago, when we published the first book of the Concurso de Poesía Rafael Cadenas, and since then we have been working and supporting each other in different projects, which brings us to this moment.

Talking about the goals that each one posed for this year and knowing the challenges that involves working for the culture in our country, we proposed a goal with which, without knowing it, both initiatives dreamed for a long time: become part of the Guadalajara Book Fair!, the most important books fair in Latin America. Arming ourselves with courage and without knowing what could happen, we decided to create a proposal to participate in this event.

It filled us with great joy to know that we were invited to talk at a table called Estamos aquí para decir Venezuela: literatura, edición y gestión cultural (We are here to say Venezuela: literature, publishing and cultural management).

It is no secret how complex it has become to work for culture and so we want to show how we keep trying and how we can create new options and strategies that adapt to a complex market to be developed at this time.

However, we do not have the resources needed to go to Mexico and although we have the collaboration of the fair in some areas, it is not enough to achieve this goal. That is why we decided to create this campaign and ask for your support.
What we need
In order to make this 12-day trip, our goal is to help us get $6,500 that will be distributed in:
- Meals.
- Tickets.
- Internal transfers.
- Accommodation.
- Cost of sending rewards to supporters.
- Indiegogo.
What you get
$10 1 book school collection.
$15 1 A surprise book from the LDF (Libros del Fuego) collection.
$20 1 Book of ""El fin de la lectura"", by Andrés Neuman, which includes a decalogue of the writer, special of this edition.
$30 1 Book of ""La Casa de Bernarda Alba"", winner of the Applied Arts Awards Desing (Canada).
$60 1 Book of the Premio de Poesía Joven Rafael Cadenas, winner Diploma of Honor in the most beautiful books of the world and signed by the writer Rafael Cadenas.
$80 1 Novelty of the catalogue of Libros del Fuego + 1 Book of “La Casa de Bernarda Alba” or 1 Book of  “El fin de la Lecura” of Andrés Neuman + 1 handbag of Autores Venezolanos.

$100 2 novelty of the catalogue of Libros del Fuego + 1 Book of Premio Poesía Joven Rafael Cadenas, winner Diploma of Honor in the most beautiful books of the world and signed by the writer Rafael Cadenas.
$200 4 novelty of the catalogue of Libros del Fuego.
$350 Workshop (4 classes) + 1 shirt of Autores Venezolanos.
$400 Editorial Coaching (4 sessions) in person or Skype.
$500 Edition Workshop + literary Dinner + 1 Aumaco of Autores Venezolanos.
Other ways to help
if you are not in your ability to give a monetary contribution, you can also help us in the following ways.
-Share our video in your networks and with your friends.
-Visit Indiegogo and share our campaign.
-Help us to spread our goal using the label #DecirVenezuela
If we make this campaign viral, we will be closer to go to the fair of the Book of Guadalajara 2018.
Thank you!

En estos 5 años de trabajo, hemos publicado 20 títulos, los cuales han obtenido un reconocimiento dentro y fuera de nuestras fronteras, siendo los más destacados el Premio Latinoamericano de Diseño Editorial, en Argentina, los Libros Más Bellos del Mundo, en Alemania, el Applied Arts Awards Desing, en Canadá y la selección en el Hotlist 2017 y 2018 de la Feria del Libro de Frankfurt, entre otros.

También, mantenemos un constante esfuerzo por participar en las ferias más importantes de Latinoamérica, teniendo una gran receptividad en la Feria del Libro de Bogotá, la Fiesta del Libro y la Cultura en Medellín, la Feria de Editores en Buenos Aires, la Furia del Libro en Santiago de Chile.
En nuestro catálogo hemos tenido la fortuna de contar con autores de amplio reconocimiento como Andrés Neuman, Alberto Salcedo Ramos, Federico García Lorca y Juan Villoro.

Para Libros del Fuego este viaje también significa mostrar los libros que hacemos y el valor que ellos tienen para nosotros, ya que en el 2017 el Ministerio de Cultura de Portugal nos escribió para notificarnos que sería el país homenajeado en la Feria del Libro de Guadalajara, en 2018, razón por la que nos invitaba a ser una de las 30 editoriales que los representara publicando autores de lengua portuguesa, en español, para ser expuestos en su stand durante la feria. Para honrar dicha invitación, decidimos participar publicando dos libros del escritor Mario de Sá Carneiro: La confesión de Lucio e Indicios de oro.
Trabajando juntos

Esta alianza comienza hace 2 años, cuando editamos el primer libro del Concurso de Poesía Joven Rafael Cadenas y desde entonces hemos estado trabajando y apoyándonos en distintos proyectos, lo que nos trae a este momento.

Conversando sobre los objetivos que cada uno se planteaba para este año y conociendo los retos que implica trabajar por la cultura en nuestro país, nos propusimos una meta  con la que, sin saberlo, ambas iniciativas soñábamos desde hace mucho. ¡Formar parte de la Feria del Libro de Guadalajara!, la feria más importante de libros en Latinoamérica. Armándonos de valor y sin saber qué podría pasar decidimos crear una propuesta para participar en este evento.
Nos llenó de mucha alegría saber que nos invitaban a conversar en una mesa llamada Estamos aquí para decir Venezuela: literatura, edición y gestión cultural.

No es ningún secreto lo complejo que se ha vuelto trabajar para la cultura y por eso queremos mostrar cómo seguimos intentándolo y cómo se pueden crear nuevas opciones y estrategias que se adapten a un mercado bastante complejo de desarrollar en este momento.

Sin embargo, no contamos con los recursos necesarios para llegar hasta México y aunque contamos con la colaboración de la feria en algunas áreas, no es suficiente para poder lograr este objetivo. Es por esto que decidimos crear esta campaña y pedirles su apoyo.
Lo que necesitamos
Para poder realizar este viaje de 12 días, nuestro objetivo es que nos ayuden a conseguir 6.500$ que se distribuirán en:
- Comidas.
- Pasajes.
- Traslados internos.
- Alojamiento.
- Costo de envío de recompensas para los contribuyentes.
- Indiegogo.
Lo que obtienes
10$ 1 Libro colección escolar.
15$ 1 Libro sorpresa de la colección LDF.
20$ 1 Libro de “El fin de la lectura”, de Andrés Neuman, que incluye un decálogo del escritor, especial de esta edición.
30$ 1 Libro de “La casa de Bernarda Alba”, ganador del premio Applied Arts Awards Desing (Canadá).
60$ 1 Libro del Premio Poesía Joven Rafael Cadenas, ganador Diploma de Honor en los Libros más bellos del mundo y firmado por el escritor Rafael Cadenas.
80$ 1 Novedad del catálogo de Libros del Fuego + 1 libro de la Casa de Bernarda Alba o 1 libro de El fin de la lectura de Andrés Neuman + 1 bolso de Autores Venezolanos.

100$ 2 Novedad del catálogo de Libros del Fuego + 1 Libro del Premio de Poesía Joven Rafael Cadenas, ganador Diploma de Honor en los Libros más bellos del mundo y firmado por el escritor Rafael Cadenas.
200$ 4 Novedad del catálogo de Libros del Fuego.

Otras maneras de ayudar
Si no está en tus posibilidades dar un aporte monetario, también puedes ayudarnos de las siguientes formas.
-Comparte nuestro video en tus redes y con tus amigos.

Si hacemos viral esta campaña más cerca estaremos de legar a la Feria del Libro de Guadalajara 2018.
¡Gracias!
Us
An independent editorial and a cultural management project unite to achieve one goal:  a journey. Let us tell you a little bit about ourselves so you can know more about what we do.

Autores Venezolanos was born in 2012 as a personal initiative, motivated by the love of reading and the palpable emptiness that existed in the diffusion of Venezuelan talent. Since then we have promoted the work of writers, musicians and visual artists, through the spreading of pieces of their works in selected clothes and accessories, cups, bracelets and handbags, as well as creating projects and organizing literary events for all audiences. Our team is formed by Tibisay Guerra (director), Miguel Díaz (design and logistics), and Mirna Freitez, (website).

We develop events as the Concurso Nacional de Poesía Joven Rafael Cadenas, which we organize together with Team Poetero and is already at its third edition. Yoga and poetry, the Christmas Retablillo of Aquiles Nazoa, which takes place since 2012. With Loreal Venezuela and the Kérastase brand  we made the ""Sé tú el poema""(Be the poem) initiative, which brings Venezuelan poetry to 58 beauty salons across the country and we were present at the exhibition Sentir Venezuela(Feel Venezuela) in the city of Miami, USA.

During this year has formed an alliance with the initiative “Qué leer”(What to read) to carry out the Silent Reading Party, which already has 7 editions. It was organized, together with the Embassy of Spain and Culture Chacao, a tribute to the poet Rafael Cadenas, to celebrate the his prize Reina Sofía of Latin American Poetry. We are also working on a new sound project called Sonorámica, along with Visual artist Starsky Brines and editorial Libros del Fuego.

Libros del Fuego is a publishing house formed in 2013 by Juan Merceron, Rodnei Casares and Alberto Sáez, which emerges from the concern to find in the market those books that its founders wanted to read. In  5 years of work, we have published 20 titles which have gained a acknowledgment within and outside our borders. Some of the most important are:  the Latin American Editorial Design Prize in Argentina; The most beautiful books in the world, in Germany; The Applied Arts Awards desing, in Canada and the selection in the Hotlist 2017, and 2018 of the Frankfurt Book Fair, among others.

Also, we maintain a constant effort to participate in the most important fairs of Latin America, having a great receptivity in those in which we participate. Some of them have been: La Feria del libro de Bogota, La Fiesta del Libro y de la Cultura, La Feria de Editores in Buenos Aires, La Furia del Libro in Santiago.
In our catalogue we have the fortune to have widely recognized authors such as Andrés Neuman, Alberto Salcedo Ramos, Federico García Lorca and Juan Villoro.

For Libros del Fuego this trip also means to show the books we make as well as the value they have for us since 2017 the Ministry of Culture of Portugal contacted us to notify that Portugal would be the country honored at the Guadalajara Book Fair  in 2018. For this reason, they invited us to be one of the 30 publishers to represent them by publishing authors of Portuguese language in Spanish to be exhibited at their stand during the fair. To honor this invitation, we decided to participate by publishing two books by the writer Mario de Sá Carneiro: La consefesión de Lucio and  Inicios de oro.
Working together

This alliance began 2 years ago, when we published the first book of the Concurso de Poesía Rafael Cadenas, and since then we have been working and supporting each other in different projects, which brings us to this moment.

Talking about the goals that each one posed for this year and knowing the challenges that involves working for the culture in our country, we proposed a goal with which, without knowing it, both initiatives dreamed for a long time: become part of the Guadalajara Book Fair!, the most important books fair in Latin America. Arming ourselves with courage and without knowing what could happen, we decided to create a proposal to participate in this event.

It filled us with great joy to know that we were invited to talk at a table called Estamos aquí para decir Venezuela: literatura, edición y gestión cultural (We are here to say Venezuela: literature, publishing and cultural management).

It is no secret how complex it has become to work for culture and so we want to show how we keep trying and how we can create new options and strategies that adapt to a complex market to be developed at this time.

However, we do not have the resources needed to go to Mexico and although we have the collaboration of the fair in some areas, it is not enough to achieve this goal. That is why we decided to create this campaign and ask for your support.
What we need

- Accommodation.

Tous pour un et tous pour Marie-Éve Belzisle!!!


Histoire de Marie...


Marie est une jeune mère de famille dévouée, dévouée à son fils et son époux. Marie est une amie hors-pair, joyeuse, enthousiaste, humble et généreuse, toujours prête pour aider ou bien encourager. Elle est un exemple de solidarité et d'amour. Sérieux, en vrai... on veut tous une amie comme Marie!!!


Il y a quelques mois, Marie nous a fait part d'une nouvelle bien inquiétante, une tumeur au cerveau. Du côté droit , me dit-elle! Benin... Ils vont me l'enlever! Pas plus compliqué que ça!...


Le 11 septembre, première opération pour notre amie, on est tous sur le qui-vive, l'estomac crispé, on croise les doigts!....

Youpi! Relâchement de l'estomac, Marie est topshape!!! Et...Bang! On resserre  l'estomac... Marie doit subir une autre intervention! Il reste un peu de la tumeur dans la tête de notre précieuse amie.....


Le 18 septembre, 2ième opération sans anicroche, tout va bien, la famille et les amis respirent à nouveau!!! Marie récupère de ses deux opérations grâce à son moral d'acier!


Et VLAN!! La mauvaise nouvelle frappe, celle qui laisse un goût âpre, récalcitrant... Le verdict tombe.... CANCER... LE maudit mot que personne ne veut entendre, prononcé dans la bouche d'un être aimée. Le mot qui laisse sans mot, sans voix et parfois sans espoir! 


Oh! Mais Détrompez-vous!!!! Marie ne s'est pas effondrée, elle NOUS a remonté le moral, nous a fait tous rire, raconté toute sorte de singerie, elle est pleine de joie de vivre!!! 

Notre amie devra se rendre à Montréal pour 6 semaines afin de recevoir des traitements de radiothérapie et de chimiothérapie. Sa mère, qui a dû quitter son emploi, se dévouera entièrement à sa fille pendant cette période, son mari restera auprès de leur fils. 

Notre intense Marie affrontera toutes sortes de montagnes russes d'émotions loin de sa famille, sa maison, ses amis... Rassurez-vous! Avec Marie, personne ne parlent de temps... Marie est debout, Marie est forte, Marie va se battre! Dans ses yeux, la flamme de la conquérante brille de milles feux! Je vaincrai, dit-elle! Nous prions tous! Sa seule demande... est que nous embarquions dans le bateau avec elle et que nous ramions avec tout notre coeur!!! On a besoin de notre Marie! Nous allons donc ramer avec toi notre amie!!! Jusqu'au bout du monde!!! 


Aujourd'hui,  ses amis et moi-même nous sommes tout de même demandé comment l'aider? Évidemment, le soucis monétaire est toujours présent dans ce genre d'épreuve, c'est pour cette raison que nous faisons appelle à vous.... Amis, familles, connaissances, québécois, étranger.... Peu importe. L'important c'est qu'en temps difficiles, on se serre les coudes. 

Parce qu'on est si généreux, parce que tous les montants sont important, parce que ensemble nous allons permettre à Marie de moins se soucier de l'aspect financier et de mieux récupérer!  

Simplement lui offrir un répit serait un cadeau du ciel après ces 6 semaines chargées auxquelles Marie va mener un combat sans faille, le combat de sa VIE. Bref... Une pause bien mérité avec son fils et son mari.


Parce que nous ne pouvons nous passer de cette femme dans nos vie!   


Parce que ensemble on peut faire la différence!


Offrons un répit à NOTRE Marie!!! 


SVP soyez généreux!!! Merci à l'avance!!!

Short Summary

Thank you for checking out my IGG for my book! I will try and keep it short and sweet. The book is ready! All I need is pre-sale help to print them up and deliver! The stories are polished...and the artwork is all done and beautiful! The cover art has been done by Erik Wilson, and the three pieces of inside artwork have been done by Martin Trafford.

""Agony & Pleasure"" is a collection of three horror novellas that vary in sub-genre. Each story is unique and different. However they do share a connection... and you can tell from the title ;) I aiming to release the book in late October!
What We Need & What You Get

My goal is to get to at least $400, and if I somehow get to $500 that will be a big help. The reason why I need to get that much is simply to create more paperback books and also help with the shipping costs!

The Hardcover books are limited and exclusive to this IGG campaign, however at this moment I am typing this (9/20/17) I have eleven copies to make and ship out... so I'm probably going to create an even 15 and those extra four will be the last copies. However if I somehow reach past 15, and get to...lets say 17? I'll make an additional 3.. to keep it even. After that...they will be gone and the paperback edition will be the only release.

- ANYBODY WHO PRE-ORDERS WILL GET A SPECIAL THANKS CREDIT IN THE BOOK. RIGHT IN THE FIRST FEW PAGES :) (only people who pre-buy through indiegogo- either $5 donation to the highest- will be thanked in the book - and it will stay there as this is the official release.)
- ALSO ONE PERSON WILL BE ENTERED INTO A RAFFLE INTO WINNING MY RESEARCH FOR THE THREE NOVELLAS.
The Impact

The Impact is simply helping a young author get his name out there... I'm only nineteen (turning twenty soon) but I have been writing for 7-8 years now and really want to share my stories with people like you!
Risks & Challenges

There are no real risks... I already wrote the stories and the book prints fine. It only takes two weeks after ordering them to have them ready to ship to backers. I am hoping to have the books delivered by Halloween :)
Other Ways You Can Help
If you'd like to share this indiegogo with anybody who would be interested, please do!

As I said before I have always dreamed about having my own office or work as a freelancer.

Although I must be honest...this has been a very tough journey...I am running out of money, hope and energy. I am almost giving up on my dream...packing my bags and go home..(but where is it, really?? I don't even know anymore...)

I come from a very humble family, my mum works in cleaning in Barcelona, she has given to me all she could ( even more that what she could!!!) I owe her everything I am and everything I have at the moment. She has raised me alone...I never met my father :(

I promised her I would study really hard and be very successful in my career. One day, she would be proud of me and realize that all the sacrifices she did for me were worth it.

Unfortunately, life in London, especially for a British ( but not really) citizen is not easy. Despite all my efforts, I am running out of money and I haven't been able to save enough to start my own business and open my own translation company. I have done a few works as a translator but nothing even close to what I need in order to make make my dream come true!!!

My mother is now sick. I have to option i pack my things and go to Barcelona, or I get enough money to start my own business and my mum can come and live with me in London!!! That would be amazing, she would be so proud and happy! :) :)

With a small contribution you can help me to:

- make my dream come true

- help the British economy ( as I will be paying taxes)

- contribute to my personal integration in British society

- be an example as a human being, with your kindness and faith in my work.

About the project:

- Once I raise enough money to open my translation office/business I will invest in marketing and advertisement.

- Acquire the first clients, provide an excellent service and make sure they will give me good feedback

- By a website to advertise my services and manage my workflow with current and potential clients

Story of My Book

Creative @ Work is a book about the creative imagination behind art, movies, TV shows, music, and businesses. Most people see business as finance, numbers, data, big companies, consulting, investing, etc. The book's goal is to explain to students or people interested in entrepreneurship that business is the ultimate creative endeavor and you need to be creative, innovative, scrappy to be the most successful business person.

My name is Andrea Lirio and I am the author of Creative @ Work. I wrote this book because I’ve always been so curious about the process in which someone creates something — or anything really — and I wanted to share what I’ve learned about how artists create and how we can apply that in our own lives.

My hope is that, in reading this book, you will discover how creativity works and how you can tap into your own creative genius. I want you to see this book as an opportunity to engage with topics on productivity, art in business, procrastination, and innovation.

You will love this book if you are trying to figure out what you want to do in life, feel like you haven’t met your full potential, or you just want to learn more about other creative minds.

Creative @ Work speaks to students and business people who want to grapple with creating solutions and improving their performance in a new way.

Ultimately, I hope that Creative @ Work inspires reflection and fruitful dialogue, pressing into engaging questions like:
• What do I love doing and how can I translate that passion into my work?
• How can we encourage everyone in our lives to be artists day-to-day?
• How can we work to improve the creativity-killing society that our productivity-obsessed workplaces and education systems create?

I look forward to exploring these questions and beyond with my readers. I believe discussing creativity, art, will change us all for the better. 
 

The Book - Creative @ Work

The book is written in 5 parts.

Part 1 contains the author’s note + chapters 1-4 on the history of business, understanding our own creative genius, the science of creativity, and why it’s important to study creative thinking.

Part 2 contains chapters 5-10 on the principles of creative business-people from finding a problem and paving a new path to it to getting over challenges.

Part 3 contains chapters 11-16 on building a strong, passionate team, encouraging creativity, and ‘invisible’ creative collaboration.

Part 4 contains chapters 17-21 on being mentally tough, looking backward at humble beginnings, and the power of authenticity.

Part 5 contains chapters 22-24 on avoiding the productivity mindset, accepting failure and the fear of being wrong, and steps to becoming your best creative self.
 

What I Need & What You'll Get

This book will be published with New Degree Press. I set up the pre-order tiers to help cover the costs for publishing my book. Money raised will go towards the following:
• The editor I will work with to revise and publish my manuscript in April 2021.
• The cover design of my book. (The mockups you see currently are a placeholder!)
• The layout design for the interior of my book (physical copy, ebook formats).
• The copy editing for my book to polish the grammar and spelling prior to publication.
• The launch & promotion efforts for my book when I ultimately publish this spring 2021.

When I pre-sell 120 copies of my book, I will publish a paperback and ebook. When I pre-sell 150 copies of my book, I will also publish a hardcover edition. When I pre-sell 200 copies of my book, I will publish a hardcover and an audiobook.

I am also offering some exclusive rewards for people who pre-order my book now:
• You will receive a personally signed copy of my book when I publish it.
• Your name will appear in the Acknowledgments section of my book.
• You will receive early access to the Author’s Note and other excerpts from my book, with the opportunity to review it and give me early feedback.
• You will have the opportunity to be involved in selecting my cover and title.
• You will be invited to join my Author Community and get behind-the-scenes sneak peeks into the publishing process.
• You will receive a specially made and super cute sticker that my sister helped design! :)
• And much more!

About the Author

Andrea Lirio is a young entrepreneur and student with a passion for learning and problem-solving. This year, she’s taking a second gap year to write her first book ""Creative @ Work"" (expected publication April 2021) and gain more work experience. She has built a portfolio of professional experiences through internships, helping launch startups in the tech industry, working for local businesses, and leading school activities. She is continuously motivated to explore and challenge herself both personally and professionally. She prides herself on being detail-oriented and an excellent time and project manager. Post-graduation, she hopes to join the business world as a business leader and work on mission-driven projects to change the world.

She loves baking, taking pictures, traveling, writing, watching Netflix, and designing things for fun. She’s also a huge Star Wars, Avengers, Disney, and Avatar the Last Airbender geek. If she had to describe herself in three words, she’d say she’s ambitious, organized, and determined.

For more information, you can connect with Andrea Lirio at arlirio@andrealirio.com and andrealirio.com and on Instagram @andrearlirio and @andrealiriothings.

Risks & Challenges

The biggest challenge with publishing a book is delivering the finished book to the backer, specifically my mailing of the book to you. I have eliminated this risk by including the cost of mailing and shipping the signed copies into each pre-order tier. 

The risk of delivering the pre-sale copies of my book is contingent on the publisher we use. I will be working closely with New Degree Press to make sure we ship the pre-order rewards to you as early as possible. We will keep all pre-sale backers up-to-date as to when my book will publish. You will know when the copies of my book you pre-ordered are expected to ship.
 

Other Ways You Can Help

Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean they can't help:

• Please share my pre-sale campaign on Facebook, Twitter, and LinkedIn with your friends, family, and network. Please use #CreativeatWork and tag me (@andrearlirio & @andrealiriothings) as well as my publisher, New Degree Press (@newdegreepress), so we can help amplify your efforts.
• You can easily share my Pre-Sale Campaign Page via Indiegogo at the top of the page.
• Please share my book with 5 friends, family members, or co-workers who you think would enjoy it via text or direct message on social media.

Thank you so much for all of your love and support!

Thanks again,
Andrea Lirio

“A soulful blend of words and images, home and outdoors, reflection and adventure.” 

“Thank you for a lovely magazine - it's a work of art.""

""Read it slowly to savour every emotion that the images and words create.""

 

(All images used for this campaign are of last year's summer issue)

 

 

Our slow & seasonal mantra

Strive to live more slowly. Keep watch for the first snowdrop, walk outside in the rain, and listen for the return of the swallows. Share stories and seasonal feasts around campfires. Scribble ideas and illustrations on an adventure in the woods, on a mountain hike, or on an early morning stroll around your garden. Choose local, handmade and sustainable. Try your hand at weaving, whittling, foraging and bottling. And every day, venture outside and celebrate the seasons.

 

The journal

Content for issue 7 will include:
<li>
Borrowed Time (escaping the norm and carving out creative friendships)
<li>
Emerging Creativity (tracking the seasons through creative acts)
<li>
Cacophonies of Colour (a Scottish seabird island)
<li>
Hanami: The Temporal Beauty of Nature (a Japanese celebration to welcome spring)
• Life Through the Seasons: Growing Up in the Yorkshire Dales
<li>
Let's Create a Wonderful World (a practical experiential reminder on the creative power of appreciation)
<li>
A Year in the Countryside (on making the big move from the city)
<li>
Transforming Our Approach to Happiness (how Bhutan leads the way, and why we should follow)
• Pantheism: A Re-Emerging Way to Connect with the Natural World
<li>
Awakening to the Light (on emerging from hibernation)

What we need & what you get

Our crowdfunding target is £3,750.

This will cover the initial printing cost for 500 copies of the spring/summer issue ('emerge') of the journal (£3,315), plus £60 for a proof copy, and £375 (10%) to cover all fees set by Indiegogo.

Previously, any profit made from an issue went towards the print cost of the next issue. However, due to the size increase, we are unable to cover the increased upfront printing cost. Currently everyone that works on the magazine (from the editor to all the contributors) does so on a voluntary basis -that's why we need your help!

 

The range of perks on offer include:

£10 - Receive a copy of our 22 page April e-book, usually only sent to community members (includes seasonal inspiration, menu ideas, moon phases, key dates, mantras and meditations, and a whole section on celebration).

£15 - 4 seasonal postcards sent by post over the next year, with a handwritten message and thoughts on the season ahead from Eleanor (editor). The first will be delivered in April, the second in July, the third in September, and the final postcard in December.

£20 - Pre-order issue 7 (spring/summer) and save 20% on the cover price (£25).

£25 - Receive digital copies of all 6 back issues (this will not be available on our website in the future, and the print version of issue 1 is sold out).

£30 - Pre-order issue 7 and receive the 4 seasonal postcards (see the £15 perk)

£35 - Receive a back issue bundle (issues 3-6) in the post and save 20%. Click here to find out more about the back issues.

£45 - Receive a copy of issue 7, and an A5 print of an illustration featured in the magazine in the post. You'll also receive the April e-book, and 4 seasonal postcards over the year (April, July, September, December) - see previous perks for more details.

£120 - Sign up to become a member of the Creative Countryside Community for twelve months, a membership for those who seek to live more slowly and seasonally. Click here for more details. Membership will be £15 per month for future sign ups, so you'll save £60 by signing up for the year now!

£175 - A one-to-one masterclass on how to create your own publication (e.g. magazine, journal), with Eleanor (editor) - travel expenses will be extra, message or email contact@creativecountryside.com for more details.

 

Timeline (approx.)

Wednesday 6th March 2019: crowdfunding campaign closes, send journal to be printed

April 2019: issue 7 published and all orders posted

Saturday 27th April 2019: official launch (seasonal lunch club)

 

 

Behind-the-scenes

I (Eleanor) left my job as an English teacher with the aim of focusing on creative writing projects for a year. Then I had a baby. And completed a Masters course. And things got busier than they have ever been. But here we are, 18 months after that first crowdfunding campaign for issue 1, and I'm still just as passionate about making this work.

The magazine (now journal) has never been a money-maker, but for me that's not the point; it has facilitated the creation of a community of like-minded souls who have joined together to share ideas, words, stories and images. I’d love it if you joined us.

 

Risk

The journal content has almost been finalised, and the design is in progress. Regardless of how much is raised, it will go to print and you will receive your copy (plus rewards) no matter what the outcome. There is no risk!

 

Other Ways You Can Help

As a small business, we'd love to increase our reach and awareness of the journal. Please share the campaign with your followers and friends if you can!

 

(Images used for this campaign are from the summer issue, published June 2018).

Story of My Book

Making Your Path is about approaching the professional world from a philosophical lens. I’ve spoken to a variety of path blazers and opportunity creators and discovered what truly drives them, in order to determine how we can apply these same truths on our professional paths.

My name is Jacob Mass and I am the author of Making Your Path. I wrote this book because I’m a young professional entering the workforce, and I wasn’t satisfied with the existing professional content. So much of it is focused purely on success and ambition. I wanted to understand the heart of it, the driving philosophies behind these great professionals.

My hope is that, in reading this book, you will discover new ways to think about your career and the way that you approach it, no matter what stage you’re in. I’ve boiled down many of the overarching truths that different professionals have come across and how these truths have impacted their drive for happiness. Ultimately, I want you to gain this wisdom that I’ve documented by speaking to these various professionals and use it as a tool to steer your own path more deliberately, and shape your professional life how you want.

In this book, you'll learn about some of the key forces behind the minds of great makers, including the Pursuit of Knowledge and Uniqueness. You'll hear stories such as...
<ul>
• Bob Greenberg, one of the first 11 Microsoft employees, who only stayed for a few years before taking off on his own professional path full of ups and downs.

• Ralph Baer, the Father of Video Games, who was originally an electrical engineer at a defense company before he took his own initiative of heading an entirely new project that would become the first video game console.

• John Park, a professional maker and content creator whose career has incorporated dozens of different skill sets over multiple decades, with each new opportunity being built from the last one’s experience.

You will love this book if you value taking a deeper look at how you’re crafting your life, and in particular, your career. You will love this book if you want to better understand yourself and the world around you through the ideals of great makers. You will love this book if you’re someone who enjoys your profession and wants to dive even deeper from a place of meaning.

Making Your Path is a nonfiction book that speaks to current and future makers, innovators, inventors, entrepreneurs, engineers, designers, and many more who want to learn to harness the driving philosophies of the professional world.
The Book - Making Your Path

The book is written in 3 parts:

Part 1 focuses on framing the book and discussing relevant concepts to approaching this book such as reassigning meaning to buzzwords and cliches.

Part 2 serves as the main bulk of the book in which each chapter features an overall driving philosophy and how it has played a role in the lives of different makers. Examples of these driving philosophies are the Pursuit of Knowledge and Uniqueness.

Part 3 revisits each driving philosophy and how you can harness them in your own career. It discusses how to move forward in making your path.

I am also offering some exclusive rewards for people who pre-order my book now:

• You will be invited to join my Author Community and get behind-the-scenes sneak peeks into the publishing process.
• And much more!
About the Author

Jacob Mass is an undergraduate student at the University of Florida. He is pursuing a degree in Digital Arts and Sciences, as well as a minor in Percussion Performance and a certificate in Graphic Design. He also works with the UF Engineering Innovation Institute.

As a young professional preparing to enter the workforce, Jacob became curious about the human, personal side of the professional world. He didn’t see enough of a focus on it, so he decided to research it himself, speaking with dozens of professionals from different backgrounds. He hopes to share the insights he gained from this journey with others.

Jacob was originally born in Montville, New Jersey and now lives in Parkland, Florida with his family and Lucy the puppy. He enjoys gardening and the occasional Zumba class. He’s slowly learning to cook, and he looks forward to long car rides so he can loudly sing along to his music.
For more information, you can connect with Jacob at jjmass721@gmail.com and on Instagram (@jacobmasscreative), Facebook, and LinkedIn.
